entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023
